alert.note: Alert for Big Island North; Lanai South; Molokai Leeward South; Molokai North; Molokai West (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 20 at 4:12AM HST until November 21 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY FOR PORTIONS OF MAUI COUNTY AND THE BIG ISLAND INCLUDING THE BIG ISLAND SUMMITS... ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST MONDAY... * WHAT...East winds 25 to 30 mph with localized gusts over 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of Lanai, Molokai and the Big Island Hawaii. * WHEN...Until 6 AM HST Monday. * IMPACTS...Winds this strong can tear off shingles, knock down tree branches, blow away tents and awnings and make it difficult to steer, especially for drivers of high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Watch out for falling tree branches when walking or driving. Make sure tents and awnings are secure or take them down. Be prepared for power outages.

area.areaDesc: Big Island North; Lanai South; Molokai Leeward South; Molokai North; Molokai West
